# This suite runs the tests in web_tests/dark-mode/images
# with --blink-settings=forceDarkModeEnabled=true and
# --dark-mode-settings=ImageClassifierPolicy=1.
# For more info on ImageClassifierPolicy see https://crbug.com/1361235.
# See the virtual_test_suites() method in tools/blinkpy/web_tests/port/base.py.
